price: 46. Epai ya falo na bankumu naye, (bato naye), basali lolendo, mpe bazalaki bato ya lolendo koleka.
arabic: إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَمَلَإِيْهِۦ فَٱسۡتَكۡبَرُواْ وَكَانُواْ قَوۡمًا عَالِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: ilā fir'ʿawna wamala-ihi fa-is'takbarū wakānū qawman ʿālīna
